En 1483 , La Provence se donne à la France; Apt suit.
在1483年, 普罗旺斯地区投靠了法国, APT随此属于法国.
Entour é de places - fortes protestantes ( M é nerbes, Sivergues , Buoux ), Apt demeure cependant fid è lement catholique dans sa grande majorit é.
处于新教包围的地盘下 ( Menerbes, Sivergues, Buoux ), 当时APT在它的大部分地区都忠于天主教.
The difficulties with existing statistical methods for measuring nucleation rates of APT were discussed.
讨论了现有直接统计的方法测定APT成核速率的困难.
